rules_text: When this spell is cast from exile, it enters with two additional +1/+1 counters and a menace counter on it. It’s a black Deserter in addition to its other colors and types.
rules_text2: Create three 1/1 black and red Youkai creature tokens. Each player loses 2 life. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast this creature later from exile.)[/i]
